item.title: 'Voice' Winner Alisan Porter Talks 'Supportive and Wonderful' Adam Lambert Friendship
item.description:
'Voice' Winner Alisan Porter Talks 'Supportive and Wonderful' Adam Lambert Friendship

Newly crowned Voice champion Alisan Porter and American Idol runner-up Adam Lambert were dear friends long before their respective reality-show stints. They co-starred in Val Kilmer's The Ten Commandments musical at the Kodak Theater in 2004 and performed together in the L.A.

item.title: 5 Tips to Make Social Media Marketing Less Overwhelming
item.description:
5 Tips to Make Social Media Marketing Less Overwhelming

http://happymarketingclub.com These are my top 5 tips for making social media marketing way less overwhelming. Would love to know what's helped you in the comments as well.

item.title: Social Media Marketing Tutorial & Guide 2016 - Free Tools for Social Media
item.description:
Social Media Marketing Tutorial & Guide 2016 - Free Tools for Social Media

Learn fun tips and tricks in this tutorial / guide to social media marketing. (Free materials, including the free Social Media Toolbook 2016 at http://bitly.com/smmfreetools). Jason McDonald leads you step-by-step through how to conceptualize Social Media MARKETING as 'throwing a party' not just attending a party.

item.title: 10 Laws of Social Media Marketing
item.description:
10 Laws of Social Media Marketing

Do you use social media to market your business? There's bit of etiquette you should be familiar with. Here are 10 points.
